long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to the browser toolbar to quickly navigate to Jobsort.com; Jobsort is a job search engine that ranks jobs in tech startups by startups' growth rates. The growth rate is predicted using linear regression on the # of website visitors the website is getting, per data from Alexa Web Information Service.
